Comparing routine neurorehabilitation program with trunk exercises based on Bobath concept in multiple sclerosis: Pilot study

program with trunk exercises
based on Bobath concept in
multiple sclerosis: Pilot study

– Although loss of selective trunk control is associated with balance, gait, and arm/hand limitations, few studies have looked at effectiveness of trunk exercises in MS population.
